name: bradsucks-player
description: Web audio player app for bradsucks.net

scripts.build: minify js/bradsucks-player.js > dist/bradsucks-player.min.js; lightningcss --minify css/bradsucks-player.css -o dist/bradsucks-player.min.css; lightningcss --minify site/dark-mode-overrides.css -o dist/bradsucks-dark-mode-overrides.min.css

author: Scott Andrew LePera
